quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
name: Jimmy Dean

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Never believe that a few caring people can't change the world. For, indeed, that's all who ever have.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Voting is the only way to make change in a democracy.
name: Christine Todd Whitman

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
name: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
name: Victor Pinchuk

quote: Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.
name: Ron Hall

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
name: Hugh Prather

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
name: Robin Williams

quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
name: Nathaniel Branden

quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
name: Heraclitus

quote: Creative thinking inspires ideas. Ideas inspire change.
name: Barbara Januszkiewicz

quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But, nothing is as painful as staying stuck where you do not belong.
name: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
name: Alicia Witt

quote: Your surroundings may change but your essence and your personality pretty much stay the same.
name: Jenna Dewan

quote: Times and conditions change so rapidly that we must keep our aim constantly focused on the future.
name: Walt Disney

quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen.
name: Philip Wylie

quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: I'm like a tree. My leaves might change color, but my roots are the same.
name: Rose Namajunas

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.
name: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: People change and forget to tell each other.
name: Lillian Hellman

quote: We need money. We need hits. Hits bring money, money bring power, power bring fame, fame change the game.
name: Young Thug

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
name: Alan Watts

quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.
name: Bono

quote: Some people change when they think they're a star or something.
name: Paris Hilton

quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the game.
name: Randy Pausch

quote: Change, like sunshine, can be a friend or a foe, a blessing or a curse, a dawn or a dusk.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: With only one bag, you can change your outfit completely.
name: Sonia Rykiel

quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: Each one of us can make a difference. Together we make change.
name: Barbara Mikulski

quote: You change the world by being yourself.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
name: Nicholas Sparks

quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Miracles happen everyday, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
name: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Ignorance is always afraid of change.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
name: Brian Tracy

quote: I've always been the type that, every few months, I'm like, 'Let's change the haircut one more time.'
name: Coco Rocha

quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Change your opinions, keep to your principles; change your leaves, keep intact your roots.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: A change of scenery can help everything.
name: Drew Pomeranz

quote: You want to be the pebble in the pond that creates the ripple for change.
name: Tim Cook

quote: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
name: Abraham Maslow

quote: I believe people change. I think that they can learn from mistakes.
name: Kevin Plank

quote: One thing modeling taught me is that the spotlight can change everything.
name: Liya Kebede

quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
name: Debby Boone

quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
name: Confucius

quote: As engineers, we were going to be in a position to change the world - not just study it.
name: Henry Petroski

quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
name: Carl Rogers

quote: Cinema is a mirror that can change the world.
name: Diego Luna

quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: The good and bad things are what form us as people... change makes us grow.
name: Kate Winslet

quote: A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: Things don't have to change the world to be important.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: The robots are coming, whether we like it or not, and will change our economy in dramatic ways.
name: Kristen Soltis Anderson

quote: All great change in America begins at the dinner table.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: You will never change your life until you change something you do daily.
name: Mike Murdock

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
name: Plutarch

quote: There are good and bad times, but our mood changes more often than our fortune.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: There is nothing so stable as change.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: I can't really change my life to accommodate people who are jealous. I don't see why I should.
name: Sting

quote: There's a lot of things that need to change. One specifically? Police brutality.
name: Colin Kaepernick

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
name: Max Lucado

quote: A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Change takes courage.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: If I want to knock a story off the front page, I just change my hairstyle.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: The rules of survival never change, whether you're in a desert or in an arena.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
name: Henri Bergson

quote: There are many things we do not want about the world. Let us not just mourn them. Let us change them.
name: Ferdinand Marcos

quote: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Face the facts of being what you are, for that is what changes what you are.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: A lot can change in the editing room.
name: Diane Lane

quote: The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
name: Carl Rogers

quote: For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: If you want to change the world, start off by making your bed.
name: William H. McRaven

quote: A leopard does not change his spots, or change his feeling that spots are rather a credit.
name: Ivy Compton-Burnett

quote: Change is always a little bit strange.
name: Brendon Urie

quote: I was willing to accept what I couldn't change.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world are the ones who do.
name: John McAfee

quote: A change of season calls for a change of scent that is both energizing and refreshing.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: Don't change on me. Don't extort me unless you intend to do it forever.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: I wake up every day in a different headspace, so on any given day, my hairstyle will change.
name: Dawn Richard

quote: I know my soul is beautiful; I know I'm a good person. And that will never change for me.
name: Khloe Kardashian

quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
name: Plutarch

quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
name: Gail Sheehy

quote: Like sunshine, music is a powerful force that can instantly and almost chemically change your entire mood.
name: Michael Franti

quote: Friendships that have stood the test of time and change are surely best.
name: Joseph Parry

quote: People change all the time.
name: Tony Shalhoub

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: True change takes place in the imagination.
name: Unknown

quote: I wouldn't change anything. I've made mistakes, but thanks to those mistakes, I've learned.
name: Enrique Iglesias

quote: After all, the ordinary hero hiding in each of us is often the most powerful catalyst for change.
name: Tate Taylor

quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Isn't life a series of images that change as they repeat themselves?
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Excellent firms don't believe in excellence - only in constant improvement and constant change.
name: Tom Peters

quote: The world of marketing has changed. You can lead the change or be a victim of change.
name: Denise Morrison

quote: The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: In true dialogue, both sides are willing to change.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: People change over the years, and that changes situations for good and for bad.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The only constant in the technology industry is change.
name: Marc Benioff

quote: It is not necessary to change. Survival is not mandatory.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
name: Marcus du Sautoy

quote: I like to change. A new lamp, a piece of art, can transform a room.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
name: Charles Revson

quote: It takes but one person, one moment, one conviction, to start a ripple of change.
name: Donna Brazile

quote: I think you should always bear in mind that entropy is not on your side.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Money and success don't change people; they merely amplify what is already there.
name: Will Smith

quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
name: Horace

quote: Peace, unity, love, and nonviolence should be our rallying cry and the catalyst for change in our nation.
name: Tony Evans

quote: Ask yourself: Have you been kind today? Make kindness your daily modus operandi and change your world.
name: Annie Lennox

quote: Lighting is a good way to change the look of a place without spending much.
name: Bobby Berk

quote: A change in bad habits leads to a change in life.
name: Jenny Craig

quote: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: Change makes you find your calling, your legacy, and God's divine plan for your life. Don't run from it.
name: Iman

quote: Civilization exists by geological consent, subject to change without notice.
name: Will Durant

quote: It's not the destination that matters. It's the change of scene.
name: Brian Eno

quote: One encounter with Jesus Christ is enough to change you, instantly, forever.
name: Luis Palau

quote: I feel proud of my journey. I wouldn't change it.
name: Dianne Reeves

quote: If you have an opportunity to help others or incite change, it feels like a moral obligation to do so.
name: Elizabeth Chambers

quote: I may be a living legend, but that sure don't help when I've got to change a flat tire.
name: Roy Orbison

quote: The Internet will change the way we work, live, learn, and play.
name: John T. Chambers

quote: Change before you have to.
name: Jack Welch

quote: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
name: Keri Russell

quote: We cannot change anything until we accept it. Condemnation does not liberate, it oppresses.
name: Carl Jung

quote: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
name: Confucius

quote: I don't know if my hairstyles reflect that, but I am someone who enjoys change.
name: Cobi Jones

quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks.
name: Regina Brett

quote: In order to change the world, you have to get your head together first.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: It's time to bring a change because the world is changing. Let's open our minds and live in present.
name: Qandeel Baloch

quote: In tough times, we all hope for knights in shining armor, or the cavalry, to show up and effect change.
name: Dean Devlin

quote: To change ones life: Start immediately. Do it flamboyantly.
name: William James

quote: Some people call it global warming; some people call it climate change. What is the difference?
name: Frank Luntz

quote: Repentance means you change your mind so deeply that it changes you.
name: Bruce Wilkinson

quote: You know, I change my hair color a lot, I do all sorts of different things.
name: Kelly Lynch

quote: You will not solve global climate change by hitting the delete button.
name: Tom Brokaw

quote: As a leader, the first person I need to lead is me. The first person that I should try to change is me.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: It is not strange... to mistake change for progress.
name: Millard Fillmore

quote: I'm very interested in how people change.
name: Nathan Englander

quote: Aging gracefully means being flexible, being open, allowing change, enjoying change and loving yourself.
name: Wendy Whelan

quote: I benefit from a change of scenery; it's always inspiring.
name: Kurt Vile

quote: I'm not going to change; I'm very stubborn in this way. I am what I am.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: Being ready isn't enough; you have to be prepared for a promotion or any other significant change.
name: Pat Riley

quote: When we lose, we don't have to change everything but correct things by working hard.
name: Neymar

quote: If your life changes, we can change the world, too.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I think fatherhood would change anybody when you have your first son. It's been amazing.
name: Russell Westbrook

quote: One change always leaves the way open for the establishment of others.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I believe global warming and climate change are real threats to our planet.
name: Andrew Cuomo

quote: Hair color is the easiest way to change your appearance, but a bad dye job might draw more attention to you.
name: Lisa Lutz

quote: Remember that life's big changes rarely give advance warning.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: You're only as young as the last time you changed your mind.
name: Timothy Leary

quote: Wars of nations are fought to change maps. But wars of poverty are fought to map change.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Injuries obviously change the way you approach the game.
name: Brett Favre

quote: The reality is that the only way change comes is when you lead by example.
name: Anne Wojcicki

quote: Change is inevitable. Change is constant.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: You put high heels on and you change.
name: Manolo Blahnik

quote: If you change the way you tell your own story, you can change the colour and create a life in technicolour.
name: Isabel Allende

quote: Change is hard and requires constant struggle and determination.
name: Sadiq Khan

quote: I think women have to change their hairstyle from time to time.
name: Yulia Tymoshenko

quote: The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinions.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: I was born not knowing and have had only a little time to change that here and there.
name: Richard P. Feynman

quote: In reality, climate change is actually the biggest thing that's going on every single day.
name: Bill McKibben

quote: People change, they grow.
name: Jacob Young

quote: The first resistance to social change is to say it's not necessary.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: A big idea is great, but putting that big idea into action has the power to change the world.
name: Tae Yoo

quote: If something is true, no amount of wishful thinking will change it.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: We will never end poverty if we don't tackle climate change.
name: Jim Yong Kim

quote: You are never too young to learn, never too old to change.
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Anyone who believes you can't change history has never tried to write his memoirs.
name: David Ben-Gurion

quote: Change is always happening. That's one of the wonderful things about jazz music.
name: Maynard Ferguson

quote: When you create change with your point of view, you have to be ready for what comes with that.
name: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Optimists are usually wrong. But all the great change in history, positive change, was done by optimists.
name: Thomas Friedman

quote: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two.
name: Octavio Paz

quote: In difficult times, it's important to speak up. We cannot change the past, but we can impact the future.
name: Mark Parker

quote: You can't think about things you want to change. Just be yourself.
name: Ethan Embry

quote: Enjoy every moment: you never know when things might change.
name: Natalie Imbruglia

quote: If you're going to change things, you have to be with the people who hold the levers.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Things do not change; we change.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Journalism is what maintains democracy. It's the force for progressive social change.
name: Andrew Vachss

quote: Change in all things is sweet.
name: Aristotle

quote: Win as if you were used to it, lose as if you enjoyed it for a change.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The right quote can inspire people to change their ways.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Peace of mind comes from not wanting to change others.
name: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
name: Jackie Chan

quote: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
name: John Wooden

quote: I'm not going to change the world. You're not going to change the world. But we can help - we can all help.
name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: All your mannerisms change easily when you have inch-long acrylic nails.
name: Margot Robbie

quote: I think there are certain ways that people are always themselves, but I do think people change.
name: Mike White

quote: Change will come slowly, across generations, because old beliefs die hard even when demonstrably false.
name: E. O. Wilson

quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis.
name: Carre Otis

quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.
name: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

quote: The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: What's dangerous is not to evolve.
name: Jeff Bezos

quote: Only idiots refuse to change their minds.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: The life purpose of the true social entrepreneur is to change the world.
name: Bill Drayton

quote: If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: To change a habit, make a conscious decision, then act out the new behavior.
name: Maxwell Maltz

quote: I am a big proponent of character arcs that show us how people change over time.
name: Annalee Newitz

quote: Let the great world spin for ever down the ringing grooves of change.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Shoes can change an outfit.
name: Tina Knowles

quote: All is connected... no one thing can change by itself.
name: Paul Hawken

quote: The more you drive positive change, the more enhanced your business model.
name: Anand Mahindra

quote: All time is all time. It does not change. It does not lend itself to warnings or explanations. It simply is.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Every single person has the power to change the world and help people.
name: Laura Marano

quote: If you want to change attitudes, start with a change in behavior.
name: William Glasser

quote: And Seaman, just like a falling oak, manages to change direction.
name: John Motson

quote: Things of this world are in so constant a flux, that nothing remains long in the same state.
name: John Locke

quote: I believe we are on an irreversible trend toward more freedom and democracy - but that could change.
name: Dan Quayle

quote: That's why I want to change Mississippi. You don't run away from problems - you just face them.
name: Fannie Lou Hamer

quote: Apologies are great, but they don't really change anything. You know what does? Action.
name: Stella Young

quote: Change will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The more things change, the more they are the same.
name: Alphonse Karr

quote: Automation will significantly change many people's lives in ways that may be painful and enduring.
name: Moshe Vardi

quote: Each child is an adventure into a better life - an opportunity to change the old pattern and make it new.
name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Sometimes if you want to see a change for the better, you have to take things into your own hands.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Someone had to change the world. And obviously I was the one for the job.
name: Joan Baez

quote: We enjoy change and freshness, and disco was only one area we've delved into.
name: Barry Gibb

quote: I change my mind a lot. I usually don't agree with what I say very much. I'm an awful liar.
name: David Bowie

quote: Change alone is eternal, perpetual, immortal.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Winners must learn to relish change with the same enthusiasm and energy that we have resisted it in the past.
name: Tom Peters

quote: Change occurs in direct proportion to dissatisfaction, but dissatisfaction never changes.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: I can't change everything by myself but I can be one of the people who are trying to change the situation.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: We shall never change our political leaders until we change the people who elect them.
name: Mark Skousen

quote: I just don't believe that you have to come in and insult people when you want to change things.
name: Sydney Schanberg

quote: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: I've seen a lot of seasons, change in my time. It's been a very lucky life.
name: Tom Brokaw

quote: If you want to change things, it requires bravery.
name: Naftali Bennett

quote: I just think we're living in a time of massive, amazing change, like the Industrial Revolution on acid.
name: Kelly Lynch

quote: In times of rapid change, experience could be your worst enemy.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils; for time is the greatest innovator.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: And almost always there has to be change, change in the characters is the journey - it's the story.
name: Graham Brown

quote: Everything changes but change.
name: Israel Zangwill

quote: You hold the keys of change within you. You be the change you want to see.
name: Victoria Osteen

quote: Dogs and other animals - goats, donkeys, cows, a grumpy rooster - continue to change my writing life.
name: Jon Katz

quote: One new feature or fresh take can change everything.
name: Neil Young

quote: The speed of change makes you wonder what will become of architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Sometimes a good love song can change the world and create positive energy more than any political song can.
name: Serj Tankian

quote: Very often a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
name: A. C. Benson

quote: I believe it's less risky long-term to embrace change.
name: Charlie Ergen

quote: When it becomes more difficult to suffer than to change... you will change.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: No change of circumstances can repair a defect of character.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Progress is a nice word. But change is its motivator. And change has its enemies.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: You don't change the course of history by turning the faces of portraits to the wall.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: We live in a world defined by the rapid pace of technological change.
name: Jerome Powell

quote: Without change, something sleeps inside us, and seldom awakens. The sleeper must awaken.
name: Frank Herbert

quote: Just because everything is different doesn't mean anything has changed.
name: Irene Peter

quote: You can change friends but not neighbours.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: In order to design a future of positive change, we must first become expert at changing our minds.
name: Jacque Fresco

quote: Like it or not, the world evolves, priorities change and so do you.
name: Marilu Henner

quote: I am unapologetic about the need for social change, greater inclusion, and equity.
name: Marley Dias

quote: One must change one's tactics every ten years if one wishes to maintain one's superiority.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
name: Les Brown

quote: He who is fixed to a star does not change his mind.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: People are fed up with seeing the same thing over and over. They want a qualitative change.
name: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: After certain ups and downs, a person does change, and I have changed for good.
name: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: You can go slow. Allow your dreams and goals to change, but live an intentional life.
name: Kumail Nanjiani

quote: A new car is not going to change your life.
name: Monica Ali

quote: Relentless, repetitive self talk is what changes our self-image.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: It all happened the way it was supposed to. I wouldn't change anything. I had such a great run.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: As the facts change, change your thesis. Don't be a stubborn mule, or you'll get killed.
name: Barry Sternlicht

quote: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.
name: Ellen Glasgow

quote: There's no reason to change what you are, but if you're not being you, then you need to acknowledge that.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.
name: Unknown

quote: Virtual reality and augmented reality will change the way we shop.
name: Michio Kaku

quote: There is no death, only a change of worlds.
name: Chief Seattle

quote: The ability to change constantly and effectively is made easier by high-level continuity.
name: Michael Porter

quote: Words are powerful; if you change your words, you can change your life.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives.
name: Elon Musk

quote: 'Movement is life;' and it is well to be able to forget the past, and kill the present by continual change.
name: Jules Verne

quote: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: All things are only transitory.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The effects of climate change are real and must be acted on.
name: Joe Biden

quote: Agility is fundamental to leading a team through times of change.
name: Sandra E. Peterson

quote: If you could go back and change things, you might not be the person you are right now.
name: Walter Payton

quote: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All things must change to something new, to something strange.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Opinions are made to be changed - or how is truth to be got at?
name: Lord Byron

quote: The world has entered an era of the most profound and challenging change in human history.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: There are people in the world who have the power to change our values.
name: John Mayer

quote: Change is not merely necessary to life - it is life.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: The world is changing very fast. Big will not beat small anymore. It will be the fast beating the slow.
name: Rupert Murdoch

quote: Social change comes through people.
name: Paul Watson

quote: Thank God I'm very satisfied with the way God created me, and I wouldn't change a thing.
name: Leila Lopes

quote: I'm into designing houses and interior design. I like change. I like creating things out of nothing.
name: Chris Kirkpatrick

quote: As human beings we do change, grow, adapt, perhaps even learn and become wiser.
name: Wendy Carlos

quote: If the shoe doesn't fit, must we change the foot?
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Climate change is a really abstract thing in most of the world.
name: James Balog

quote: Love is an attempt to change a piece of a dream world into reality.
name: Theodor Reik

quote: In thirteen years, every aspect of the universe can change - ask a thirteen-year-old.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Change alone is unchanging.
name: Heraclitus

quote: I try to contrast; life today is full of contrast... We have to change.
name: Gianni Versace

quote: Any change, even a change for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.
name: Arnold Bennett

quote: Too many people just eat to consume calories. Try dining for a change.
name: John Walters

quote: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress.
name: Charles Kettering

quote: I'm about creating positive change in the communities that I come from.
name: Malcolm Jenkins

quote: Nothing endures but change.
name: Heraclitus

quote: There are two kinds of fools: those who can't change their opinions and those who won't.
name: Josh Billings

quote: If we want a great nation, we have to change it ourselves.
name: Cory Booker

quote: You cannot change a person. Let them be. Let them be the way they are.
name: Melania Trump

quote: I want to test my maximum and see how much I can do. And I want to change the world of swimming.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Things alter for the worse spontaneously, if they be not altered for the better designedly.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: It's the most unhappy people who most fear change.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: You set paths for yourself, but as you get older, things change.
name: Ian McShane

quote: I never want to change so much that people can't recognize me.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: You don't have to be a superhero to change the arc of history.
name: Chieh Huang

quote: Habits change into character.
name: Ovid

quote: Worry is a useless mulling over of things we cannot change.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: In a progressive country change is constant; change is inevitable.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: It's tragic from how far we've come from 'Hope and Change'.
name: Ted Cruz

quote: You can be a catalyst for change but change never really entirely happens just because of one guy.
name: Robert Griffin III

quote: I could say diamonds are a girl's best friend, and that never changes. But the taste for art did change.
name: Susan Vreeland

quote: If you never change your mind, why have one?
name: Edward de Bono

quote: The key to Turkey's success has been its ability to reinvent itself as times change.
name: Stephen Kinzer

quote: Pick up a rifle and you change instantly from a subject to a citizen.
name: Jeff Cooper

quote: I think it is important to differentiate between lip service towards something and actually making change.
name: Hozier

quote: I shall not change my course because those who assume to be better than I desire it.
name: Victoria Woodhull

quote: Change is inevitable. Change for the better is a full-time job.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: Cultural change always precedes political change.
name: Tessa Thompson

quote: I look forward to change, but there is a part of me that absolutely dreads it.
name: Erica Durance

quote: Change, when it comes, cracks everything open.
name: Dorothy Allison

quote: Characters do change over time; there are surprises, role reversals, and things like that.
name: Paul Dini

quote: You change your business plan to anticipate and adapt to changes in the marketplace.
name: Jon Feltheimer

quote: Lord, where we are wrong, make us willing to change; where we are right, make us easy to live with.
name: Peter Marshall

quote: People in both parties are restless for change, ready to break free of old patterns in Washington.
name: Mike Pence

quote: At Apple, we believe that people with passion can change the world.
name: Angela Ahrendts

quote: I have to change. It's like a curse.
name: Miles Davis

quote: Perfection is immutable. But for things imperfect, change is the way to perfect them.
name: Owen Feltham

quote: Change is the only constant. Hanging on is the only sin.
name: Denise McCluggage

quote: All men can and will change. But there's only one woman we're going to change for.
name: Steve Harvey

quote: Change brings opportunity.
name: Nido Qubein

quote: Because things are the way they are, things will not stay the way they are.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Weep not that the world changes - did it keep a stable, changeless state, it were cause indeed to weep.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: Change is not only likely, it's inevitable.
name: Barbara Sher

quote: Not only is women's work never done, the definition keeps changing.
name: Bill Copeland

quote: Taste may change, but inclination never.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Success is self-defined. You can choose what you think success is, and you can always change your mind.
name: Mark Manson

quote: All I want to do is change the world.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Illness strikes men when they are exposed to change.
name: Herodotus

quote: To change what you get, you must change who you are.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: Anyone who thinks there's safety in numbers hasn't looked at the stock market pages.
name: Irene Peter

quote: Slowness to change usually means fear of the new.
name: Phil Crosby

quote: Change means that what was before wasn't perfect. People want things to be better.
name: Esther Dyson

quote: Change is no threat to culture.
name: Wade Davis

quote: Change is tough, people don't like it, but it is necessary. Take two aspirins and call me in the morning.
name: Christopher Bond

quote: Change is such hard work.
name: Billy Crystal

quote: Excuses change nothing, but make everyone feel better.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: A hero is someone right who doesn't change.
name: George Foreman

quote: Christians are supposed not merely to endure change, nor even to profit by it, but to cause it.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: When you are through changing, you are through.
name: Bruce Barton

quote: What we call progress is the exchange of one nuisance for another nuisance.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: A lot of people get impatient with the pace of change.
name: James Levine

quote: The main dangers in this life are the people who want to change everything... or nothing.
name: Nancy Astor

quote: If you can change three lives in 10, three lives in a hundred, that's got to be good, hasn't it?
name: Ian Botham

quote: As with anything creative, change is inevitable.
name: Enya

quote: Everything in life that we really accept undergoes a change.
name: Katherine Mansfield

quote: The world changes in direct proportion to the number of people willing to be honest about their lives.
name: Armistead Maupin

quote: If you want to change the culture, you will have to start by changing the organization.
name: Mary Douglas

quote: I don't know if you can change things, but it's a drop in the ocean.
name: Julie Walters

quote: If you feel like it's difficult to change, you will probably have a harder time succeeding.
name: Andrea Jung

quote: Serve the dinner backward, do anything - but for goodness sake, do something weird.
name: Elsa Maxwell

quote: Our fathers valued change for the sake of its results; we value it in the act.
name: Alice Meynell

quote: In not my, but our collective hands, is held the promise of change.
name: Mark Sanford
